replies.body: Our target is around midnight PST tonight (Tuesday) for the start of the patching process.
Thanks for the answer Meddler :) was it delayed because of Labor day or something else?
What do you mean by patching process? Powering down the servers and that? Or simply announcing server maintenance?
championship zed is making me all giddy
Yesterday was a holiday in the US, so it's probably delayed by a day.
I thought Riot kept some tradition of always upgrading it on Tuesday (Except once I think someone goofed the coding and it was delayed to prevent a bug).

typical negative winrate V divisioners who don't account for holidays xd

stop ruining normals with op champs like yasuo
